sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Charitable Trust Stabilization Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Charitable Trust Stabilization Act.

sections.heading: Grant eligibility. To be eligible to receive a grant under this Act, an organization must be a community-based organization or other not-for-profit entity that:
sections.text: Grant eligibility. To be eligible to receive a grant under this Act, an organization must be a community-based organization or other not-for-profit entity that:

sections.heading: Permissive application.   The grant program under this Act
sections.text:
is permissive and is subject to appropriation by the General
Assembly.
